sentence.text: This chapter focuses on the current data covering the etiology and epidemiology, clinical presentation, and pathogenesis of four monogenic forms of isolated dystonia: DYT-protein homooligomerization, DYT-negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, DYT-tetrahydrobiopterin biosynthetic process, and DYT-GNAL

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
